title: AT&T names John Stankey as chief operating officer - Nasdaq.com
text: Sept 3 (Reuters) - U.S. wireless carrier AT&T Inc  on Tuesday named John Stankey as its chief operating officer effective Oct. 1.
Stankey currently the chief executive officer of WarnerMedia, the entertainment business of AT&T, has been in the company for over three decades.
The company also named Jeff McElfresh as the head its communication business, replacing John Donovan, who retired earlier.
